content: दीक्ष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (दीक्षते, दीक्षित) {@--1@} To consecrate or prepare oneself for the performance of a sacred rite; see दीक्षित below. {@--2@} To dedicate oneself to. {@--3@} To initiate or introduce a pupil. {@--4@} To invest with the sacred thread. {@--5@} To sacrifice. {@--6@} To practise self-restraint. {@--7@} To shave one's head, to be shaved.
